/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of white and beige, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. Their windows reflect the sunlight, adding a warm glow to the scene. The trees, lush and green, provide a natural contrast to the urban architecture. Street lamps and power lines crisscross the street, hinting at the city's infrastructure. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, with the sun shining brightly in the top right corner, casting shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees.
